backend/main.mo: Actor providing user profiles with access control plus lead submission and admin-only lead retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence describing gallery update requirements and referencing GalleryPage.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries of multiple frontend source files.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with six pages wrapped in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with business info, contact details, social links, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with logo, desktop navigation, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper including header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshing queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeo.ts: Hook that updates page title and meta description.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContactInqui: Mutation hook submitting contact form data to backend and invalidating lead queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light and dark mode, base typography, and a utility background pattern class.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About Us page with branding, company description, stats, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, inquiry submission, WhatsApp link, success UI, and SEO setup.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a gallery grid of catering images with modal previews and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the homepage with hero section, navigation buttons, highlights, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Provides a categorized menu using tabbed UI and SEO metadata for the catering offerings.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders the Services page with SEO settings and a grid of service cards using predefined icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the project's custom theme.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, requirements, features, and architectural notes for the Royal Bikana Caterers website.
